body:
Comment 8 by **bubblboy**: 
Thank you for the pointers, b88zhou. Unfortunately, the illegal instruction remains:

localadmin@h:/tmp$ env | grep '^GO'
GOARM=5
GOARCH=arm
GOROOT=/usr/local/home/localadmin/go
GOOS=linux
localadmin@h:/tmp$ cat hello.go
package main

func main() {
println("hello from println")
}
localadmin@h:/tmp$ 5g hello.go && 5l hello.5
localadmin@h:/tmp$ ./5.out
Otill√•ten instruktion
localadmin@h:/tmp$ echo $?
132
localadmin@h:/tmp$ cd $GOROOT
localadmin@h:~/go$ hg ident
02ea3f16b8fc tip


Greetings,

Hraban
